Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that President Obama has put a complete stop to all oil drilling and exploration offshore or in Alaska.
Understate: The claim understates the number of new drilling permits issued under the Obama administration.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to back up the statement that President Obama has completely halted all oil drilling and exploration.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations or factors that may have influenced the number of drilling permits issued.
